programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: Before he passes away, the Emperor shares the location of the edict with Wang Xuan and instructs her to announce it after his death.

programme.title: Better Plan for Better Life
programme.desc: Wang Jian of the Chinese Academy of Engineering discusses the complexity and challenges of urban management.

programme.title: The Queen of News
programme.desc: In the matter of the New Year baby, Ka-yin outlines the litigation costs for the antagonist as she hopes to dissuade them from proceeding with the legal case.

programme.title: The Queen of News
programme.desc: Redevelopment of an old district is about to commence.

programme.title: The Queen of News
programme.desc: To deal with the molestation matter, Wai-sum introduces new measures.

programme.title: The Queen of News
programme.desc: Under peer pressure, Hiu-mei threw rubbish at a woman picking up trash.

programme.title: The Queen of News
programme.desc: Hiu-mei’s well-educated background is in fact Wai-sum’s scheme, so Wai-sum knows her weaknesses.

programme.title: Angry Pursuit
programme.desc: Lin Yuan, who once served in the field army, lives with the haunting memory of a mistake he made during a special operation, that resulted in the death of all his teammates and hostages. He accidentally gets involved with the criminal group from his past, and begins to strip away the inner layers of the criminal group.

programme.title: The Glory of Global Chinese
programme.desc: The University of Chicago integrates art into education, daily life, community engagement, and cultural preservation through its world-class resources, while actively engaging outstanding students in art appreciation and analysis.

programme.title: Boiling Pot
programme.desc: Noelle joins Jennie Chang to have a Cantonese style seafood feast at the 30-year-old restaurant 888 Seafood.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Wen Yu does a livestream in a restaurant to introduce new products. Netizens suggest that she watches Chen Ming's livestream after they sense that she is not in a good mood. Chen Ming helps Wen Yu, causing her to feel awkward and hoping that she will not bump into him again.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Yu Ting feels uneasy that Chen Shi's family is going on an overseas trip then gets into a car accident. Mr. Pang, who was with Yu Ting, informs Chen Shi. Chen Shi rushes to the hospital and hugs Yu Ting tightly, Mr. Pang is stunned at the sight. Yu Ting chooses not to repress her feelings any longer and decides to stay beside Chen Shi no matter what.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Lin Li has a face-off with Yu Ting. Yu Ting tries to taunt Lin Li by telling her how well she and Chen Shi suit each other - working well and having similar interests. However, Lin Li tells Yu Ting about her 15 years of marriage to Chen Shi, and that the two have definitely been through more than Chen Shi and Yu Ting have; Yu Ting argues that all these are in the past.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Chen Shi realises that Lin Li is ill and requires surgery; he feels guilty and is unable to abandon her. News of Yu Ting and Chen Shi's relationship surfaces at the tuition centre, leaving Yu Ting with no choice but to resign. Yu Ting asks Chen Shi about the future plans and he tells her that he cannot abandon Lin Li right now as she is ill, leaving Yu Ting disappointed.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: Yu Ting is pregnant; unable to contact Chen Shi, she waits for him near his house. She tells Chen Shi and Lin Li about her pregnancy, leaving them shocked. Lin Li gives the divorce documents to Chen Shi, asking for his signature as she knows that the marriage cannot be salvaged. Si Yuan is unable to accept the fact that her parents are getting a divorced.

programme.title: The Glory of Global Chinese
programme.desc: The University of Chicago integrates art into education, daily life, community engagement, and cultural preservation through its world-class resources, while actively engaging outstanding students in art appreciation and analysis.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: A gravitational pull of the three suns destroys Civilization 184 in the Three-Body game. Pan Han tries to win over Mu Xing with more information, but after recent events, she decides to trust Shi Qiang and steals evidence from Pan Han's computer.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: After an assassination attempt is made on Shen Yu Fei, Ye Wen Jie encourages her to leave for safety. Ye Wen Jie brings Wang Miao to visit the long-abandoned Hong'an Base.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Ye Wen Jie continures her story and reveals the true purpose of the base was to search for extraterrestrial civilizations. After bidding goodbye to Wang Miao, Ye Wen Jie stays and watches the sunset, as if waiting for something.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Wang Miao meets Shi Qiang to exchange the information they have obtained, and Shi Qiang does not believe that everything was coincidence. The two set off back to Beijing, and ask Xu Bing Bing to continue investigating Shen Yufei's whereabouts.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Wei Cheng tells the story of how his obsession with trying to solve the Three-Body calculation led him to marry Shen Yu Fei and how he received threats on his life from Pan Han should he try to discontinue solvng the problem.

programme.title: My Dad
programme.desc: When a father and daughter magically switch bodies, they learn to overcome their differences and understand each other in the process of pursuing each other's dreams.

programme.title: Boiling Pot
programme.desc: Invited by Taiwanese immigrant couple Ming and Michelle Hsu, Noelle gets to hear their memories of Taiwanese Bento Box while tasting classic Taiwanese street food.

programme.title: American Moments
programme.desc: With the slogan of "No lines, no checkout", Amazon Go opens its sixth store in the financial district of San Francisco. Our hosts visited the store to get first-hand experience.

programme.desc: Wen Yu does a livestream in a restaurant to introduce new products. Netizens suggest that she watches Chen Ming's livestream after they sense that she is not in a good mood. Chen Ming helps Wen Yu, causing her to feel awkward and hoping that she will not bump into him again.
